title: 10 "Sakons Puppet: The Ghost Chapter - Part III"(Japanese:「信州百狐血雨地獄」〜第一段〜) December 3, 1999(1999-12-03)
transformers_text: 10 Sakon s Puppet The Ghost Chapter Part III Japanese December 3 1999 1999 12 03 Sakon deduces from evidence that a left handed person committed both murders but everyone there is right handed S a ko discovers that Aoki an assistant with his head bandaged from a fire years earlier is really left handed Sakon uses Uk on to mimic the voices of the dead men tricking Aoki into confessing that he is the killer It is revealed that Aoki is in reality the ex husband of Keik o Haya mi's partner and Aoki is seeking revenge for the death of their daughter years earlier in the fire that disfigured him when he tried to save her
tf_idf_text: sakon puppet ghost chapter part japanese december sakon deduces evidence leave handed person commit murder everyone right hand discovers aoki assistant head bandage fire year earlier really leave hand sakon us mimic voice dead men trick aoki confess killer reveal aoki reality husband keik haya mi partner aoki seek revenge death daughter year earlier fire disfigure try save
